decks.notes: The main focus of this deck is to maintain control of the board while applying pressure on the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells. By combining spells like Counterspell, Lightning Bolt, and Skred with creatures like Kor Skyfisher and Seeker of the Way, the deck aims to disrupt the opponent's game plan and deal damage quickly. The inclusion of cards like Mulldrifter and Archaeomancer allows for card advantage and recurring powerful spells. The deck also utilizes card filtering and mana fixing through cards like Preordain, Brainstorm, and Arcum's Astrolabe to ensure consistency in its plays.

This Mono Black Aggro deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's hand and board with cards like Chittering Rats, Crypt Rats, and Chainer's Edict, while also draining their life with Gray Merchant of Asphodel. The deck maintains card advantage with Dusk Legion Zealot and Phyrexian Rager, and utilizes removal spells like Defile, Snuff Out, and Tendrils of Corruption to control the battlefield. The deck also includes recursion with Unearth and disruption with Oubliette. Overall, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent with efficient creatures and removal spells to secure victory.

The main concept of this deck is to quickly establish a board presence and apply pressure on the opponent through efficient creatures and direct damage spells. The deck aims to maintain card advantage through cards like Palace Sentinels and Thraben Inspector while utilizing the mana fixing of Arcum's Astrolabe and Prophetic Prism. The inclusion of cards like Prismatic Strands and Journey to Nowhere provide answers to opponent's threats, allowing the deck to maintain control of the game. The mana base is designed to support the deck's color requirements while also providing some life gain through Radiant Fountain.

This mono black aggro deck focuses on quickly building a board presence with low-cost creatures like Phyrexian Rager and Gray Merchant of Asphodel while using removal spells like Victim of Night and Disfigure to control the opponent's board. The deck also includes disruption cards like Cuombajj Witches and Chittering Rats to slow down the opponent's game plan. By efficiently managing resources and applying pressure early on, this deck aims to overwhelm the opponent and secure victory through aggressive creature attacks and removal spells.

The main focus of this deck is to establish control over the game by using cards like Pestilence and Guardian of the Guildpact to clear the board of threats. It also aims to gain life and card advantage through cards like Pristine Talisman and Night's Whisper. The deck includes removal spells like Chainer's Edict and Disfigure to deal with opposing creatures, while also disrupting the opponent's hand with cards like Duress and Castigate. The deck's win condition revolves around maintaining board control and eventually overwhelming the opponent with powerful creatures like Guardian of the Guildpact.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly generate mana and flood the board with Elves to overwhelm the opponent. Utilizing cards like Priest of Titania and Elvish Mystic to ramp up mana production, the deck aims to deploy powerful creatures like Timberwatch Elf and Elvish Vanguard to deal massive damage. Lead the Stampede and Distant Melody help in refilling the hand with more elves, allowing for consistent pressure on the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to be aggressive and efficient in building a strong board presence to secure a swift victory.

This deck focuses on controlling the game using the Urzatron lands to generate mana and powerful spells to disrupt the opponent's strategy. The deck includes a mix of card draw, counterspells, and flicker effects to maintain control and outvalue the opponent. With access to versatile spells like Mystical Teachings and Mulldrifter, along with efficient creatures like Stonehorn Dignitary and Dinrova Horror, the deck aims to stall the game until it can overwhelm the opponent with its powerful late-game threats.

The main focus of this deck is to apply pressure through cheap creatures while maintaining control with efficient removal and counterspells. The deck aims to outvalue opponents by utilizing cards that generate card advantage, such as Mulldrifter and Arcum's Astrolabe, while also being able to disrupt the opponent's game plan with countermagic like Counterspell and Dispel. The deck is also able to recur key spells with Archaeomancer and Ephemerate, providing additional value and versatility to the strategy.

The deck focuses on an aggressive playstyle while also utilizing midrange elements to control the game. By combining red, white, and blue cards, it aims to quickly build a board presence with flying creatures and efficient removal spells. The use of snow lands and artifacts like Arcum's Astrolabe provide additional card advantage and mana fixing. Counterspells and interaction spells help disrupt the opponent's game plan while cards like Mulldrifter and Archaeomancer offer value and flexibility. Overall, the deck aims to pressure the opponent while maintaining control of the game.

This deck focuses on deploying efficient threats and controlling the board through counter spells and removal. By using bounce effects and card advantage, the deck aims to outvalue the opponent while putting pressure on them with a mix of creatures and burn spells. The deck's mana base allows for versatility and consistency, while cards like Mulldrifter and Ephemerate provide card advantage. Overall, the strategy is to disrupt the opponent's game plan while maintaining a strong board presence to secure victory.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through efficient use of spells and creatures, while utilizing the synergy between Sunscape Familiar and Nightscape Familiar to reduce the cost of your spells. The deck aims to set up a loop with Ephemerate and Ghostly Flicker to maximize card advantage and control the board, utilizing key cards like Mulldrifter and Mnemonic Wall to recur key spells. The inclusion of Mystic Sanctuary and Snap allows for additional value and flexibility. Overall, the deck aims to out-value and out-manuever the opponent with its control elements.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Tireless Tribe card to quickly draw through the deck and combo off. By cycling through cards and drawing with spells like Ponder and Brainstorm, the goal is to create a massive power and toughness boost on Tireless Tribe with Inside Out. The deck also includes protection spells like Dispel and Circular Logic to help maintain the combo. Additionally, cards like Thraben Inspector and Kor Skyfisher provide some additional utility to the deck. The use of snow-covered lands and Arcum's Astrolabe help with mana fixing and consistency.

The main concept of this deck is to overwhelm the opponent with fast, aggressive creatures and pump spells. By combining efficient creatures like Skarrgan Pit-Skulk and Nettle Sentinel with powerful spells like Rancor and Hunger of the Howlpack, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Savage Swipe and Vines of Vastwood also helps to maintain board control and protect key creatures. Overall, this Mono Green Aggro deck focuses on speed and aggression to win the game as quickly as possible.

This deck focuses on controlling the board with removal spells like Skred and Lightning Bolt while also utilizing cheap creatures like Spellstutter Sprite and Seeker of the Way to put pressure on the opponent. The main goal is to maintain a steady flow of card advantage through cards like Mulldrifter and Deep Analysis, while also using flicker effects like Ephemerate to reuse powerful enter-the-battlefield effects. The mana base is designed to maximize consistency while also taking advantage of snow-covered lands for potential synergies.

The main focus of this deck is to control the board and disrupt opponent's plays using counterspells and removal spells, while generating value through card draw and recursion. The deck aims to stall the game in the early turns with efficient removal spells like Skred and Lightning Bolt, before establishing board presence with creatures like Mulldrifter and Kor Skyfisher. Additionally, the deck makes use of flicker effects like Ephemerate and Archaeomancer to recycle key spells and generate additional value. The mana base is optimized to support the deck's multicolor requirements.

The main concept of this deck is to utilize efficient creatures like Seeker of the Way, Kor Skyfisher, and Glint Hawk to establish a strong board presence while also using versatile spells like Skred, Lightning Bolt, and Counterspell to control the game. The deck aims to maintain tempo and apply pressure on the opponent through aggressive creatures and efficient removal, while also having access to card advantage and recursion with cards like Mulldrifter and Archaeomancer. The mana base is streamlined with snow lands and artifacts like Arcum's Astrolabe to ensure smooth mana fixing and consistency in casting spells.
